function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate implementation of virtual reality technology","Impact":"Lower effectiveness in disease mitigation efforts","Mitigation":"Proper training and education on virtual reality implementation","Technologies":"Virtual reality technology","People":"Healthcare personnel","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, training organizations"},{"Description":"Overreliance on virtual reality technology","Impact":"Neglect of traditional healthcare methods","Mitigation":"Balancing virtual reality training with traditional healthcare practices","Technologies":"Virtual reality technology, traditional healthcare tools","People":"Healthcare personnel, patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, training organizations, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Inequitable access to virtual reality technology","Impact":"Unequal distribution of training and skills enhancement opportunities","Mitigation":"Investment in accessible VR technology, subsidies for VR training programs","Technologies":"Accessible virtual reality technology","People":"Healthcare personnel, students, researchers","Owner":"Government, educational institutions, healthcare institutions"}]}
